title: Geo
description: The geographic related data where an event was observed.

xdm:countryCode.title: Country code
xdm:countryCode.description: The alpha-2 code of the country as defined by [ISO 3166-1](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html).

xdm:stateProvinceCode.title: State or Province ISO Code.
xdm:stateProvinceCode.description: The country subdivision using alpha-2 code of the country as defined by the second part of [ISO 3166-2](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html#2012_iso3166-2) Example: ISO 3166-2 `US-CA` value designating the state of California in the United States of America. Example: ISO 3166-2 `FR-75` value designating the metropolitan department of Paris in France.

xdm:postalCode.title: Postal code
xdm:postalCode.description: The postal code of the location. Postal codes are not available for all countries. In some countries, this will only contain part of the postal code.

xdm:dmaID.title: Designated Market Area
xdm:dmaID.description: The Nielsen Media Research designated market area.

xdm:msaID.title: Metropolitan Statistical Area
xdm:msaID.description: The Metropolitan Statistical Area in the USA where the observation occurred.
